abstract: Federal prosecutors intend to call Warren E. Buffett, the billionaire investor and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, to testify against five former senior insurance executives accused of helping the American International Group manipulate its financial statements through $500 million in phony transactions, according to court papers filed Monday.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors intend to call Warren E. Buffett, the billionaire investor and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, to testify against five former senior insurance executives accused of helping the American International Group manipulate its financial statements through $500 million in phony transactions, according to court papers filed Monday.

headline.main: U.S. to Call Buffett in Gen Re Trial
